name: Birds (Jammin'!)
description:
We are proud to present to you our game : Birds

It's a game where you play a character who tries to walk on a tightrope, but birds land on your stick so you have to be careful to not be destabilized.

The game can be played with arrows keys of your keyboard, but we recommand that you use the left stick of a controller.

Hope you have fun!

Tools used :

  • Godot
  • Photoshop
  • Pro tools
